Blackstorm:

Blackstorm nodded "I have this "said while she showed her craws"I 
can scrach with them and hurt enemies in close combat" after that 
she aimed to a target and shot a feather missile "This is my feather 
missile, I can shot a target at 50 feet" after that she did an 
energy ball and shot it towards  other target "And this is my last 
weapon..."the femme signed and said "It seems that I have a few 
weapons.."


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> In a message dated 4/24/03 10:37:49 PM Central Daylight Time, 
> airly2002@h... writes:
> 
> 
> > "I'll remember that, Maxima"replied Blackstorm
> > 
> > 
> > 
> 
> She watched Blackstorm, "Don't 'remember' it, Blackstorm. Log that 
into your 
> memory banks. There... you WILL remember it forever." 
> 
> "Show me your weapons. Shoot at a target & tell me what they can 
do."
